section.name: Maven 2 Repository
section.p: This project provides its release artifacts via a Maven 2 repository located at http://maven2-repository.jdtaus.org/repos/releases . <repositories> <repository> <releases> <enabled>true</enabled> <updatePolicy>never</updatePolicy> </releases> <snapshots> <enabled>false</enabled> <updatePolicy>daily</updatePolicy> </snapshots> <id>jdtaus-releases</id> <name>jDTAUS Release Repository</name> <url>http://maven2-repository.jdtaus.org/repos/releases</url> </repository> </repositories>
